attributes.action: Set up a Brexit Petition for people who voted leave to sign
attributes.additional_details: Exiting the EU is the will of the people how can you even think of revoking article 50 in defiance of the democratic vote that was undertaken
attributes.background: There is no Brexit Petition to sign  so all we hear about is how many people have signed the remain Petition so lets get on equal terms and let Parliament and the remainer's  know that we the majority all still of the same opionion
